About


`` பாயும் ஒளி நீ எனக்கு!``


`` You are a beacon to me (us)``


This web log is run by AG & NT as a means of pondering over the intricacies of Bharathi’s kavithais (poems) and their relevance in and/or influence over modern day Tamil popular culture, be it movies or songs. As with any venture that is destined for greatness (trumpet bellows in the background), this one has an origins story as well.


Here goes! (not exact words, recreating the vague memory of a whatsapp conversation)

“Dude!”
“Duuude!”
“I was reading insert title paatu dude. That’s sema mass dude.”
“Dude, avarai adichikkavae mudiyathu la dude?”
“Bloody mass dude, that boy!. Dude, neeyum padipaya?”
“Ofcourse dude!”
“We should do something dude. We should write up songs we like, and provide our own interpretations dude.”
“Dude, mass idea, we totally should! But antha alavu gnaanam laam illaiye enakku!”
“Dude, namba interpretation, discussion maathiri oru format la! Aanithanama, ithu than sari nu sollavendamae! “
“Dude, kandippa dude, lets do this!”
“Bloody mass, we are doing this”


Several months later,

“Dude!”
“Dude?”
“(naaye, manathil) It is already June!”
“Aaamala, sari, per choose pannuvom first!”
“It has to do with light dude. Somehow.”


After a bit of dilly-dallying,

“பாயும் ஒளி நீ எனக்கு!”
“Mass!”


And so it begins!


AG is a consultant, draws, paints and is diving head first into photography.
NT is an engineer, is slowly turning into a mountain goat and shares AG’s love of photography.
Both whole-heartedly believe சோறு முக்கியம் ! and are உடன்-பிறவா உடன்பிறப்புகள் !. (It’s a thing!)



Disclaimer : We are novices, take everything we say with a generous helping of salt :P

AG & NT
